name: Toad
description: A unified terminal interface for AI coding agents that supports 12+ agent CLIs (OpenHands, Claude Code, Gemini CLI, etc.) through the ACP protocol, with advanced features like fuzzy file search, markdown streaming, shell integration, and Jupyter-like navigation.

name: Autofix Bot
description: Hybrid static analysis and AI code review agent that combines deterministic static analysis with AI-powered code review for more accurate and actionable feedback.

name: Confucius Code Agent
description: Open-source AI software engineer designed for industrial-scale codebases, achieving 54.3% first-attempt success rate on complex coding tasks.
